markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Elephant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=201)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Those who live near elephants have learned to be wary of angering the beasts, but even with precautions in place, elephants sometimes still rampage. There is little an individual person can do when even a single elephant becomes enraged. Furthermore, a herd of angry or frightened elephants can easily destroy an entire village.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Elephant_Elelphant.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Elephant](/Monsters.aspx?ID=201)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 154</row>

**Perception** +13; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +15

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +0

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +18 

**Ref** +11 

**Will** +13 

</row>

**HP** 130

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tusk +16 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 3d8+9 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
trunk +18 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** grabbing trunk

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +16 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+9 bludgeoning

**Grabbing Trunk**   A Medium or smaller creature hit by the elephant’s trunk is [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20). If the elephant moves, it can bring the [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) creature along with it.

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Large or smaller, foot, DC 24

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-46" />
name: Elephant
